title: I love you: Samantha to AR Murugadoss
text:
Pretty damsel Samantha and actor Vikram were on a television show recently for the release of a single from their upcoming film, '10 Endrathukulla'. Also present were the director of the film Vijay Milton and one of the producers, AR Murugadoss. Samantha had earlier worked with Murugadoss in the Vijay-starrer 'Kaththi'. When the host of the show asked director-turned-producer Murugadoss why he didn't choose Samantha to work in his latest Hindi film (Akira, for which he chose Sonakshi Sinha), he jovially replied "I have divorced Samantha".
Wishing the ace director and also recalling the above incident, Samantha tweeted, "@ARMurugadoss happy birthday sir. I love you even though you divorced me.ðŸ˜‹ lots more love happiness and blockbusters to you." (sic)
Reacting to her tweet, AR Murugadoss posted, "@Samanthaprabhu2 hahaha...don't you know that you are always my sweetheart.?"
Produced by Fox Star India and Murugadoss, '10 Endrathukulla' starring Vikram and Samantha in the lead, is a road thriller that has music by D Imman.
